</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> worldDir: [[Array]] - vector direction in world space in format [x,y,z] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value>Convert world space vector [0,-10,4] to model space of object _airplane:
